definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
vast, with no clear boundary/fig. hazy/indistinct/unclear/confused

sentences.english: She always has a gormless look in meetings.
sentences.chinese: 開會她總是一副一臉茫然的表情。

sentences.english: Nick smoked and stared at the car dumbfounded, dazed.
sentences.chinese: 尼克抽着煙，盯着汽車目瞪口呆，一臉茫然。

sentences.english: QiLe after hearing a face of vacant, I do not know how to choice.
sentences.chinese: 祁樂聽後一臉茫然，不知如何抉擇。

sentences.english: Otherwise, go after the consumer point of bewildered, not knowing what to choose good.
sentences.chinese: 不然消費者點進去以後一臉茫然，不知道選什麼好。

sentences.english: Again, a blank look from the barista.
sentences.chinese: 他仍然一臉茫然地看着我。
